string.name: help_para1
string.div:
Welcome to Aakash Programmming Lab(apl) 

 Aakash Programming Lab has C, C++, Python and Scilab as programming languages.

string.name: help_para2
string.div: Within each programming console, a detailed documentation along with reference manual, has been provided. To read the documentation, click on Option button.

string.name: help_para3
string.div: This will pop an option Menu-Bar. Click Help for detailed help.
